sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.query: executive summary company overview value proposition traction customers opportunity
sections.instruction: Draft a concise investment-grade summary describing what the company does, the assets for sale, commercial traction, customer profile, and why the deal matters now.

sections.name: Company Overview
sections.query: founding headquarters team milestones mission leadership investors history business model
sections.instruction: Describe the company history, mission, leadership, operational footprint, and major milestones. Highlight scale and organizational strengths.

sections.name: Product Overview
sections.query: product features differentiators pricing deployment roadmap customers use cases
sections.instruction: Explain the platform, core modules, pricing approach, deployment model, and differentiators. Emphasize value propositions and customer outcomes.

sections.name: Market Opportunity
sections.query: market size growth trends competitors tam sam som demand drivers regulation
sections.instruction: Summarize the target market size, growth rates, demand drivers, competitor positioning, and why now is the right timing for acquisition.

sections.name: Technology & IP
sections.query: tech stack architecture data assets patents proprietary automation infrastructure
sections.instruction: Detail the technology stack, proprietary assets, patents, automation tooling, and any defensible data advantages. Note scalability and reliability themes.
